## IAxisConfig interface

Configures an axis of the chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IAxisConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [label?](./plot.iaxisconfig.label.md) | string \| [IAxisLabelConfig](./chart-def.iaxislabelconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the label for the axis. |
|  [ticks?](./plot.iaxisconfig.ticks.md) | [IAxisTicksConfiguration](./chart-def.iaxisticksconfiguration.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Configures the tick marks for the axis. |
